thread.section_title: Rome Times Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic Hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic Hotel - Review of Rome Times Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Susan T
title: Fantastic Hotel
text: We stayed in this hotel for 5 nights. The rooms were lovely, very clean and modern. The staff were friendly and professional. The location of the hotel was within walking distance to many of the major attractions, and also close to some excellent restaurants. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this hotel and would definitely book to stay here again.
